circular cord as you work the raglan in the 4 round repeat throughout the pattern please note that on round 1 of the repeat you will decrease 1 st each raglan 4 total sts and then increase 4 sts with the yarnover on round 2 of each repeat all images text & illustration © 2021 millys knit designs all rights reserved pattern designed for per- summer tee v5 / pg 3 sonal use only graded & edited by
